show_time_estimate.label: Show Fate Time Estimate
show_time_estimate.tooltip: Enable or disable the display of time estimates for fate completion.

show_objective_estimate.label: Show Fate Objective Estimate
show_objective_estimate.tooltip: Enable or disable the display of objective estimates for fate completion.

show_fate_type_icon.label: Show Fate Type Icon
show_fate_type_icon.tooltip: Enable or disable the display of fate type icons in the UI.

show_bonus_fate_icon.label: Show Bonus Fate Icon
show_bonus_fate_icon.tooltip: Enable or disable the display of bonus fate icons in the UI.

highlight_selected_fate.label: Highlight Selected Fate
highlight_selected_fate.tooltip: Enable or disable highlighting of the currently selected fate in the UI.

show_preparing_fate_icon.label: Show Preparing Fate Icon
show_preparing_fate_icon.tooltip: Enable or disable the display of preparing fate icons in the UI.

fade_ignnored_fates.label: Fade Ignored Fates
fade_ignnored_fates.tooltip: Enable or disable fading of ignored fates in the UI.
